channel.title: [317] 2 clicks and client closes. [317]
channel.description:
Hi. I have a common problem, in-which I have seen help topics of a similar type in this section, but I cannot find anymore- So I have decided to post a new thread asking for specific help on resolving this problem- which is beginning to seriously annoy me. Anyhow, the title say's it all.
For any 317 client I use to play on a server, or even my own, any 2 clicks on the "playing area" as I call it, the client closes. I know most of you guys around Mopar know how to resolve this, so I look forward to any replies regarding how to fix this fucking problem, and I hope you guy's will share your knowledge with me.
Thanks for taking interest, Kate.
